LanguageData.Cleaning.description: Cleaners clear snow and clean in the home region.
LanguageData.Hauling.description: Haulers carry things to where they need to be.
LanguageData.Art.description: Artists create beautiful works of art.
LanguageData.Crafting.description: Crafters create things from rough materials.
LanguageData.PlantCutting.description: Plant cutters remove and harvest the wild plants you've designated.
LanguageData.Mining.description: Miners dig out squares that you have designated for mining. If these are mineral squares, they will yield usable minerals.
LanguageData.Growing.description: Growers plant seeds and harvest grown crops.
LanguageData.Repair.description: Repairers fix broken-down buildings and equipment.
LanguageData.Construction.description: Constructors build things that you've designated.
LanguageData.Hunting.description: Hunters kill animals which are designated to be hunted.
LanguageData.Cooking.description: Cooks fill paste dispensers and prepare meals.
LanguageData.Warden.description: Wardens visit prisoners to recruit them, have a nice chat, beat them, or execute them - whatever you have decided. Wardens also deliver food to prisoners.
LanguageData.Patient.description: Patients go to medical bed if they need to receive treatment.
LanguageData.Doctor.description: Doctors bring food and treat those lying incapacitated in bed. They will care for both colonists and prisoners.
LanguageData.Firefighter.description: Firefighters extinguish fires in the colony.
